programme.title: Wudang Rules
programme.desc: Having suffered a traumatic setback, former undercover police officer PAU KAI-CHUNG (Chin Siu Hou) takes shelter in the Wudang Mountains, where he encounters his senior and childhood acquaintance MO YEE-SHAN (Yuen Qiu). YEE-SHAN, who runs a hostel and teaches martial arts, lets KAI-CHUNG stay and work as a chef, above which she also takes in a blockhead of dubious background, HO CHING-TUNG (Derek Kok). Who could have thought a group of Hong Kong Kung Fu students would cause such a stir in this previously peaceful secluded getaway? The students include YEE-SHAN's daughter LOK YEUNG (Tavia Yeung), terminally ill boxing champion CHEUNG KA-KONG (Timmy Hung), wealthy heir LO YIK-HIN (Cheung Wing Hong), private bodyguard YEUNG CHING-WU (Toby Leung) and model SIU YUK (Regen Cheung) etc. It turns out that KAI-CHUNG and LOK YEUNG have already known each other in Hong Kong; whereas LOK YEUNG's sudden appearance triggers his grief-stricken memories. Later on, KAI-CHUNG unveils LOK YEUNG's real purpose which is to convince her mother to sell the hostel to a Hong Kong corporation. Pretending to be injured, YEE-SHAN appoints KAI-CHUNG to succeed her, continuing to teach everyone martial arts. On top of that, she even promises LOK YEUNG that she is going to fulfill her wish if LOK YEUNG is able to win the competition within three months. As the course is drawing to a close, CHING-TUNG suddenly becomes normal, and even recognizes who KAI-CHUNG really is. All of a sudden, the whole Wudang Mountains are on the verge of crisis......

programme.title: A Perfect Man
programme.desc: Yeung Yat-cheng (Joe Ma) has a good reputation in the realm of personal security. He is invited by his buddy Ha Chung-chau (Tsui Wing) to join a security company that is tasked with protecting a tycoon called Tseung Ding-tin (KK Cheung). While starting his new job, Yat-cheung is faced with personnel issues. Meanwhile, due to his unhappy childhood, Yat-cheng does not believe in marriage. However, he happens to hook up with Yau Chi-ching (Ali Lee). And Chi-ching then even starts working for the security company. Yat-cheng gradually has affectionate feelings for her. But the couple's relationship has to overcome certain hurdles. Moreover, problems keep cropping up as Ding-tin's son Cheuk-ting and his buddy Miu Shing-lam (Ricco Ng) secretly return to Hong Kong. Shing-lam even keeps picking on Yat-cheng. While Yat-cheng and Chi-ching's relationship gradually improves, Yat-cheng suspects Chi-ching has some ulterior motive as he somehow discovers her secret. The couple's relationship is on the verge of breaking up.

programme.title: The Unusual Prosecutor
programme.desc: Department of Justice SADPP Pau Hey-yan (Joe Ma) possesses extreme empathy as he suffers from a rare condition called â€œmirror-touch synesthesiaâ€�. His aim is to piece together the complete truth in a case, strive to get the defendant to plead guilty, and minimize the sufferings of the victims from tedious hearings. Hey-yan teams up with law clerk Kung Suen Pak (Winki Lai), like-minded Senior Inspector Chin Hung-fei (Ricco Ng), former victim Chun Sheung-yin (Hera Chan) and trainee prosecutor Chiu Zhi-ching (Aska Cheung) to uphold justice. The chums run into obstacles. And Hey-yan has to turn hostile against his mother, who is the eldest daughter of a conglomerate, and confront his ex-lover Wong Chung-sing (Alice Chan), who is a barrister by profession. programme.title: Exorcist's 2nd Meter, The

However, some demonic curse has caused Ma Kwai to keep thinking of a doctor by the name of Chong Tsz-yeuk (Mandy Wong). Tsz-yeuk then hooks up with genie Wind Lion god (C Kwan), eventually reviving certain memory of limbo in her subconscious. Pui Pui-na (Moon Lau) has died because of Ma Kwai. She then transforms into a phantom to keep him company. But Pui-na just cannot leave everything behind as she is too sentimental about the mortal realm. A child abuse case triggers off the comeback of demonic power. Wai-ho has actually been controlled by mysterious demonic power.

While starting his new job, Yat-cheung is faced with personnel issues. Meanwhile, due to his unhappy childhood, Yat-cheng does not believe in marriage. However, he happens to hook up with Yau Chi-ching (Ali Lee). And Chi-ching then even starts working for the security company. Yat-cheng gradually has affectionate feelings for her. But the couple's relationship has to overcome certain hurdles. Moreover, problems keep cropping up as Ding-tin's son Cheuk-ting and his buddy Miu Shing-lam (Ricco Ng) secretly return to Hong Kong. programme.title: Exorcist's 2nd Meter, The
programme.desc: Taxi driver Ma Kwai (Kenneth Ma) goes down the road to exorcism as he is destined to perpetuate the legacy of genie Shek Kam-dong. He is also reunited with the mature soul of his buddy Mok Wai-ho (Hubert Wu). He even encounters Sze Loi-sze (Gloria Tang) and his younger brother Sze Lo-sze, who are both exorcists. However, some demonic curse has caused Ma Kwai to keep thinking of a doctor by the name of Chong Tsz-yeuk (Mandy Wong). Tsz-yeuk then hooks up with genie Wind Lion god (C Kwan), eventually reviving certain memory of limbo in her subconscious. Pui Pui-na (Moon Lau) has died because of Ma Kwai. She then transforms into a phantom to keep him company. But Pui-na just cannot leave everything behind as she is too sentimental about the mortal realm. A child abuse case triggers off the comeback of demonic power. Wai-ho has actually been controlled by mysterious demonic power.

Unwilling to see ON shoulder the burden on his own, KWAN KA-LOK (Linda Chung), the third of the siblings, turns to her supervisor GAO WANG-CHIM (Michael Tse) for assistance, resulting in her taking part in an indecent proposal. Her boyfriend, TING KOON-FUNG (Ron Ng), breaks up angrily with her when he finds out about their affair. KWAN KA-WING (Him Law), the youngest of the four, prefers spending to saving and decides that he will in no circumstances help in the service of the mortgage. The family dream of buying a house turns out eventually to be a nightmare that never ends.

programme.title: A Perfect Man

While starting his new job, Yat-cheung is faced with personnel issues. Meanwhile, due to his unhappy childhood, Yat-cheng does not believe in marriage. However, he happens to hook up with Yau Chi-ching (Ali Lee). And Chi-ching then even starts working for the security company. Yat-cheng gradually has affectionate feelings for her. But the couple's relationship has to overcome certain hurdles. Moreover, problems keep cropping up as Ding-tin's son Cheuk-ting and his buddy Miu Shing-lam (Ricco Ng) secretly return to Hong Kong. Shing-lam even keeps picking on Yat-cheng. While Yat-cheng and Chi-ching's relationship gradually improves, Yat-cheng suspects Chi-ching has some ulterior motive as he somehow discovers her secret. The couple's relationship is on the verge of breaking up.

While starting his new job, Yat-cheung is faced with personnel issues. Meanwhile, due to his unhappy childhood, Yat-cheng does not believe in marriage. However, he happens to hook up with Yau Chi-ching (Ali Lee). And Chi-ching then even starts working for the security company. Yat-cheng gradually has affectionate feelings for her. But the couple's relationship has to overcome certain hurdles. Moreover, problems keep cropping up as Ding-tin's son Cheuk-ting and his buddy Miu Shing-lam (Ricco Ng) secretly return to Hong Kong. programme.title: Love Reserved
programme.desc: Walaupun kelihatan tegas di luar, Cem mula menyedari bahawa dia masih menyimpan perasaan terhadap Leyla. Dia cuba menghampiri Leyla untuk berbincang secara baik, namun ditolak dengan keras. Leyla menegaskan bahawa urusan mereka hanya profesional. Namun, apabila restoran Leyla menghadapi gangguan bekalan dapur, Cem secara diam membantu menyelesaikan masalah itu — tanpa memberitahu siapa. Leyla mula tertanya-tanya, adakah Cem masih peduli?

programme.title: Congkak
programme.desc: Kisahnya bermula apabila Kazman serta isterinya Sufiah mengambil keputusan bercuti bersama dua anaknya, Lisa dan Ely di sebuah banglo di tepi tasik. Kazman sudah berjanji dengan seorang kawannya untuk membeli banglo tersebut sebagai persinggahan semasa bercuti. Pelbagai peristiwa pelik berlaku sepanjang perjalan mereka termasuk kehilangan telefon bimbitnya. Setibanya mereka di banglo tersebut, peristiwa yang semakin pelik turut terjadi. Sufiah cuba meyakinkan Kazman untuk keluar dari rumah tersebut tetapi tidak diendahkan. Kazman tetap berkeras untuk membeli rumah tersebut kerana sudah berjanji dengan kawannya. Sufiah sentiasa merasakan ada makhluk sedang memerhatikannya. Salah seorang anak mereka, Lisa setiap malam akan turun ke sebuah bilik gelap untuk bermain congkak dengan seseorang yang hanya boleh dilihat olehnya seorang. Sufiah yang tidak boleh bersabar dengan perkara itu telah membuang congkak tersebut ke dalam tasik. Lisa juga sentiasa bermain di tepi belukar di belakang rumah kerana kawannya tinggal di situ sehingga Kazman perasan Lisa bermain menghadap kubur lama. Pada malam keesokannya, Sufiah dikejutkan lagi dengan bunyi congkak tersebut dari bilik yang sama. Apabila Sufiah pergi melihat, dilihatnya seorang tua sedang bemain congkak tersebut. Semakin lama peristiwa yang berlaku semakin pelik dan menyeramkan sehingga pada malam ketiga kedua-dua anaknya telah hilang dan Sufiah didapati tidur di siling bilik. Pak Tua, penduduk paling lama di kampung itu telah pergi ke rumah tersebut untuk menyelamatkan keluarga Kazman dan mencari Ely dan Lisa. Apakah sejarah sebenar banglo tersebut dan dapatkan Sufiah diselamatkan serta berjayakah Ely dan Lisa ditemui semula.

programme.desc: Seorang bapa yang ingin membalas dendam atas kematian isteri dan anaknya yang terbunuh mengikuti pembunuh, seorang pengutip hutang, kepada losmen pada suatu malam. Dengan pembunuh yang tinggal di bilik sebelah, kali ini hantu berlaku bukan dalam satu bilik tetapi dua. Dalam kejutan yang mengejutkan, di antara harta benda si mati, Golok menjumpai keratan akhbar lama yang menggambarkan sebuah keluarga yang hilang di motel berhantu itu, membayangkan bahawa bukan kebetulan mereka terjumpa Losmen Melati pada malam sebelumnya. Berapa ramai lagi yang tahu tentang rumah tamu terkutuk itu dan apakah masalah masa depan yang akan dibawa oleh ini?

programme.desc: Bersama-sama pengacara membincangkan isu-isu terkini dalam Selamat Pagi Malaysia.

programme.title: Abus
programme.desc: Animasi tentang sebuah komuniti Abus yang mempunyai unsur hiburan dan pengajaran yang menerapkan nilai- nilai murni untuk membentuk perpaduan negara.

programme.title: CALAR CINTA
programme.desc: Adrea mengalami tumpah darah lalu dibawa ke hospital. Inara datang melawat Adrea di hospital tetapi malangnya kedatangannya tidak disenangi Adrea lalu beredar. Adrea turut menolak kedatangan ibu Harris dengan sikap sombongnya.

programme.title: (DL) World News

programme.title: My Heart
programme.desc: Raisa yang patah hati selepas tunangnya, Rio, hilang tiba-tiba, pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari jawapan. Di sana, dia bertemu Mike, seorang pelakon drama popular yang sebenarnya berperwatakan sensitif dan bermasalah, berbeza dengan wataknya di kaca TV. Perkenalan mereka secara kebetulan menjadi semakin rapat apabila mereka mula mengenali diri sebenar masing-masing. Namun, cinta mereka diuji apabila terbongkar bahawa ibu Mike, Rika, adalah isteri kedua kepada ayah Raisa, menyebabkan perebutan harta antara keluarga mereka.

programme.desc: Phoenix's engaging young presenter tracks weather movements and forecasts upcoming conditions in her upbeat, lively presentation coupled with music, folklore and traditional wisdom pertaining to different weather conditions in various times of the year, making Weather Forecast a true delight regardless of rain or shine.

programme.title: PAW Patrol

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions
programme.desc: In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the Danube river in Vienna, Austria on a baby animal mission to help a newly hatched European pond turtle reach water. Along the way, the intrepid team witness the emergence of ten million mayflies.
